manipulators.description: Change left_control to lang2 and left_control.

to.shell_command: ~/local/bin/tmux send-keys -t $(cat ~/.config/ai_agents/current_tmux_ai_agent_session.txt) '/new' && sleep 0.1 && ~/local/bin/tmux send-keys -t $(cat ~/.config/ai_agents/current_tmux_ai_agent_session.txt) Tab && sleep 0.1 && ~/local/bin/tmux send-keys -t $(cat ~/.config/ai_agents/current_tmux_ai_agent_session.txt) Enter
